examples: All visitors must report to reception.
Todos los visitantes deben presentarse en recepción.
Cars must not park in front of the entrance (= it is not allowed).
Los coches no deben aparcar delante de la entrada (= no está permitido).
I must ask you not to do that again.
Debo pedirle que no vuelva a hacer eso.
You mustn't say things like that.
